mapper.select: select distinct p.id, p.code, p.name,p.uri,p.method from bms_permission p left join bms_role_permission rp on p.id = rp.permission_id left join bms_role r on r.id = rp.role_id left join bms_user_role ur on ur.role_id = r.id left join bms_user u on u.id = ur.user_id where u.user_name = #{userName} and p.is_deleted = 'N' and rp.is_deleted = 'N' and r.is_deleted = 'N' and ur.is_deleted = 'N' and u.is_deleted = 'N'
